name: Kevin Jonathan

name: MJ
title: Entrepreneur

name: Suwandi

name: Stephen Burhan

quote: I have the privilege of knowing Mr. Stephan Hutagaol as a dedicated lawyer, an active advocate within business owners‚Äô networks, and a man of strong integrity. name: Yudi AP

name: Rafles Siregar

name: Tirta Susilo

name: Ps. Rodko

name: Sherly Hartono, FHUI 1998

name: Vicky G. Saputra

name: Donny & Paula

quote: Not very often I meet a person who is both great at overlooking things from a macro perspective, yet can handle detail micro things if needed to. quote: Stephan is super reliable and helpful to his friends. He is also generous in sharing his knowledge to others. These strengths are the keys to his success now, which is well deserved.

name: Grace Hakim

His leadership style is the perfect blend of professional discipline and empowering guidance.

name: Kartika, SH., MKn.
title: Notaris & PPAT Jakarta Selatan (Rekan MKn 2006)
quote: Stephan Anggita Hutagaol, S.H., M.Kn., M.Si., CCD. adalah salah seorang dari sekian banyak pengacara yang saya kenal dan dengan bangga saya sebutkan sebagai salah ¬†satu Senior yang sangat saya hormati dan berdedikasi di bidang hukum, terlihat dari banyaknya gelar yang beliau peroleh menunjukan bahwa keingintahuan dan rasa haus beliau akan ilmu pengetahuan terutama berhubungan dengan hukum sangat luas tidak hanya ilmu beracara, ilmu kenotariatan pun beliau geluti sehingga seluruhnya ¬†menjadi bekal bagi beliau sebagai pengacara yang handal dan ¬†menjunjung nilai-nilai keadilan dalam pelaksanaan praktek sehari-hari.

name: Hendra Willyan
title: K.I.A Tours & Travel
quote: Hutagaol is a helpful friend with a strong character yet friendly and funny.I learned much from him, especially during my time as a BNI Member, he often give me advise especially about my networking way in BNI.

name: Leon
title: Entrepreneur
quote: Stephan is a highly driven, systematic, and principled professional who approaches every challenge with a clear, insightful opinion. Whether acting as a sharp and dedicated lawyer or being a devoted family man to his two great sons, his integrity and character always shine through.

name: Ricky & Irene Roesli
quote: A committed and enthusiastic leader who has the ability to generate discussion to become inspiring positive result. Stephan has the ability to explain complex ideas in simple term, his openness to communication make people feel valued and heard.

name: Markus Marselinus Soge, SH., MH.

Setelah dia berkarir jadi lawyer, dia sangat profesional ya setahu saya, dan tetap terus berteman dengan siapapun, termasuk dengan teman temannya alumni, termasuk saya. Secara personality kerohanian dia juga oke, dan dia tetap cinta Tuhan, dan terus bersemangat untuk melayani Tuhan. Bravo buat Stephan.

name: Riyanto

quote: Stephan Hutagaol is a highly approachable and energetic lawyer who truly stands by his clients. With his positive attitude and unique, friendly personality - even known for his love of singing - he makes every legal process feel less intimidating. His strongest expertise is in debt recovery, with a fair and client-focused principle: ‚ÄòYou pay when you get paid.‚Äô Professional, trustworthy, and genuinely caring, Stephen is a lawyer you can rely on.

name: Pdp. Marsya Manopo S.Th

quote: I‚Äôve known Stephen for quite a long time, and he is someone who carries a very strong positive energy. He always remains calm in facing any situation and always makes room to help others

name: Timothy Oroh

quote: Stephan as I recall is sharp, honest, and always ready to help. A pursuer of truth with a strong sense of what is right and a clear mind, someone you can count on.

name: Sarmauli Simangunsong
title: Partner at Nindyo & Associates
quote: I've known Stephan Hutagaol for quite some time, about 15 years. Initially, he was a legal officer at a large company that was a client of mine, so I interacted with him frequently on business matters. As a legal officer, Stephan was meticulous, a perfectionist, and fussy when it came to his lawyers' work output. But I understood he did it for the good of the company he worked for. Then, Stephan switched professions to become a lawyer, and we sometimes partnered on projects. His meticulous and perfectionist attitude hasn't changed. While he used to act for the benefit of the company, now he works wholeheartedly for the benefit of his clients. That's the Stephan I know.
